mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (m_id, mo_id, id, guest_id, s_id, quantity, total_price, reg_date) VALUES (#{mId}, #{moId}, #{id}, #{guestId}, #{sId}, #{quantity}, #{totalPrice}, NOW())
INSERT INTO review(id, s_id, m_id, content, rating, r_picture, liked, status) VALUES(#{id}, #{sId}, #{mId}, #{content}, #{rating}, #{rPicture}, #{liked}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE shop SET heart = heart + 1 WHERE s_id = #{sId}
mapper.select: SELECT heart FROM shop WHERE s_id = #{sId}
SELECT review.*, menu.name AS menuName FROM review JOIN menu ON review.m_id = menu.m_id WHERE review.s_id = #{sId} ORDER BY review.r_no DESC
SELECT * FROM menu WHERE s_id = #{sId} ORDER BY m_id ASC
SELECT * FROM menu_option WHERE m_id = #{mId} ORDER BY price
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM menu WHERE s_id = #{s_id} ORDER BY category

SELECT * FROM shop where 1=1
AND category = #{category}
AND name like concat('%', #{keyword} ,'%')
ORDER BY s_id DESC
